segments.text: Good day , Madam . What service do you require today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like some info about your Payroll Services , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's possible to sign an agreement with us , and then we can pay your staff directly . That is called an Entrustment Agreement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . How is it paid ? I mean , what payment methods are possible ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can transfer the funds each month , at your request , into each employee's account . It is possible to pay in cash or to pay directly to the employee's savings account , no matter which bank they do business with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds pretty good . Tell me , must we use the same payment method for all of our employees ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . We can adjust the payment methods depending on the requirement of each employee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds just perfect . I'll talk things over with some colleagues and get back to you . Thank you very much for the information .
segments.speaker: S2
